text: And don't leave me stranded in the middle of where the Perfectly Normal Beasts carefully avoiding the Domain of the King Bar \ & Grill. #MostlyHarmless

passages.fragment: And do n't leave me stranded in the middle of
passages.full_quote: <used>And don't leave me stranded in the middle of</used> some primitive zarking forest with no medical help and a head injury

passages.fragment: in the middle of where the Perfectly Normal Beasts
passages.full_quote: The Domain of the King Bar \ & Grill was slap bang <used>in the middle of where the Perfectly Normal Beasts</used> would be charging if they didn't take a minor transdimensional diversion on the way

passages.fragment: the Perfectly Normal Beasts carefully avoiding the Domain of the King
passages.full_quote: Even the distant thunder of <used>the Perfectly Normal Beasts carefully avoiding the Domain of the King</used> seemed suddenly a little muted

passages.fragment: the Domain of the King Bar \ & Grill
passages.full_quote: In fact only one of the spaceships was parked in front of <used>the Domain of the King Bar \ & Grill</used>
